fields.name: botThinkingDelay
fields.label: Bot Thinking Delay (ms)
fields.description: The time in milliseconds to wait before the bot shows its response, simulating thinking.

fields.name: objectPluralName
fields.label: Object Plural Name
fields.description: The plural name of the Liferay Object used for chat messages (e.g., 'chatmessages').

fields.name: objectMessageField
fields.label: Object Message Field
fields.description: The name of the field in the Liferay Object that contains the message text (e.g., 'messageText').

fields.name: objectScope
fields.label: Object Scope
fields.description: Select if the Liferay Object is scoped to a Site or the whole Company (Instance).

fields.name: correlationIdField
fields.label: Correlation ID Field
fields.description: The name of the numeric field in the Liferay Object used to order messages (e.g., 'messageID').

fields.name: initialCorrelationId
fields.label: Initial Correlation ID
fields.description: The starting numeric value for the first message in the sequence.

fields.name: correlationIdIncrement
fields.label: Correlation ID Increment
fields.description: The value to add to the current ID to get the next message (e.g., 1 for sequential, 2 for every other).

fields.name: chatHeaderBgColor
fields.label: Header Background Color
fields.description: The background color of the chat window header.

fields.name: chatHeaderFontColor
fields.label: Header Text Color
fields.description: The text color of the chat window header.

fields.name: launcherBgColor
fields.label: Launcher Background Color
fields.description: The background color of the chat launcher button.

fields.name: userMessageBgColor
fields.label: User Message Background Color
fields.description: The background color for user messages.

fields.name: userMessageFontColor
fields.label: User Message Text Color
fields.description: The text color for user messages.

fields.name: botMessageBgColor
fields.label: Bot Message Background Color
fields.description: The background color for bot messages.

fields.name: chatWindowBgColor
fields.label: Chat Window Background Color
fields.description: The background color of the main chat window.

fields.name: botMessageFontColor
fields.label: Bot Message Font Color
fields.description: The text color for bot messages.

fields.name: chatButtonBgColor
fields.label: Send Button Background Color
fields.description: The background color of the 'Send' button.

fields.name: chatButtonFontColor
fields.label: Send Button Font Color
fields.description: The text color of the 'Send' button.

fields.name: launcherIconColor
fields.label: Launcher Icon Color
fields.description: The color of the icon inside the launcher button.

fields.name: launcherIconSize
fields.label: Launcher Icon Size (px)
fields.description: The size of the icon inside the launcher button.

fields.name: launcherIconName
fields.label: Launcher Icon Name
fields.description: The name of the Clay icon to use for the launcher (e.g., 'chat').
